Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.spring.config

Class SignServiceConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.signservice.spring.config.SignServiceConfiguration
  • @Configuration
@Import({se.swedenconnect.signservice.config.spring.OpenSAMLConfiguration.class,se.swedenconnect.signservice.config.spring.converters.SignServiceConverterConfiguration.class})
@EnableConfigurationProperties(se.swedenconnect.signservice.config.spring.SpringSignServiceConfigurationProperties.class)
@DependsOn("openSAML")
public class SignServiceConfiguration
extends Object
    Main configuration for a SignService application.
